alert.note: Alert for White Mountains of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 31 at 1:40AM PST until February 02 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM THURSDAY TO 4 PM PST FRIDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 5000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches above 5000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In California, White Mountains of Inyo County. In Nevada, Esmeralda and Central Nye County. * WHEN...From 4 AM Thursday to 4 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult on Highway 168 across Westgard Pass and Nevada 266 across Lida Summit.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
